DOC.brief_summary: The study aim describe evaluate effect chronic beetroot juice supplementation acute mountain sickness symptom exercise hypoxic environment . It hypothesize beetroot supplementation decrease acute mountain sickness increase exercise performance .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Chronic Nitrate Supplementation Acute Mountain Sickness Exercise Performance Hypoxia
DOC.criteria: Women : Regular menstrual cycle postmenopausal Stayed altitude 2500m last 6 month Traveled altitude 2500m last 2 month Unable give inform consent Unstable medical condition .
